headline: Village on Edge of No-Man’s Land Looks Warily to Peace
text: CIRAQLI, Azerbaijan — The fate of the people of Ciraqli, in a rural corner of the southern Caucasus, had long been forgotten by the outside world since a war between Azerbaijan and Armenia halted in a cease-fire in 1994. But the conflict never ended for the villagers.
snippet: A village on the frontline of the war between Azerbaijan and Armenia welcomes peace — after more than two decades.
